title: Looking for high gold+ Mid Laner that needs a team.
body:
Rules:

No Flaming/ Toxic behavior of any sort.
Follow directions
Listen
Love your teammates
Have respect
Come to practice
Of course there is more standard rules, but I'm not going to mention those.

Requirements:

Gold+
Good mentality
Ready to have fun and succeed
Know more than 3 champs in their role
Social Skills
Making practice all the time
Teamspeak: 50.97.95.135:10317

Application:

Name/Nickname:
Rank:
Age
Role:
Champion Pool:
Rank Experience:
Agree to rules and Req:
Shot calling ability (1-10) (10 being highest):
What makes you better from others:
Team Ranked Experience:
(Let me know anything you may want to say/ impress me here):

This will continue till the roster is full so if you see a role say open you are welcome to try out for it.

Roster:
Sponsored by Peak eSports
Owner/Analyst: Reaper/besp

Top Lane: NightEvolved
Jungle: Oregano
Mid Lane: Open
Adc: 1TrueHero
Support: Th3B3ar

Practice times:
Monday: Solo/Relax
Tuesday: Solo/Relax
Wednesday: Solo/Relax
Thursday: 6 P.M. - 10 P.M. Eastern
Friday: 6 P.M. - 10 P.M. Eastern
Saturday: 5 P.M. -  10 P.M. Eastern
Sunday: 5 P.M. - 10 P.M. Eastern
(Subject to change if you can not make the times.)

Add Th3B3ar if interested.
DO NOT ADD UNLESS YOU FILL OUT AN APP!
We will not try out anyone who hasn't filled out an app!

replies.body: I'm on, people are asking me to register for some tournament or something. ._.

Name/Nickname:** Connor**
Rank: **Plat 5**
Age: **18**
Role: **Midlane**
Champion Pool: Too big to put on here, only putting top 7. - **Xerath, Leblanc, Ahri, Nidalee, Zed, Cassiopeia, Lissandra**
Rank Experience: **???**
Agree to rules and Req: **Yes**
Shot calling ability (1-10) (10 being highest): **8 (Mid-Late game only)**
What makes you better from others: **Always aggressive and making plays.**
Team Ranked Experience: **Played on multiple 5's/tourney teams. (7+)**
(Let me know anything you may want to say/ impress me here): **Uh...**
